game.name: DVG Survivors
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: DVG Survivors is a casual idle-roguelike-survival game where you watch your DVG logo bounce across the screen and destroy your enemies with various abilities. Who are your enemies? Well none other than other mixed media from across the ages.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DVG Survivors is a casual idle-roguelike-survival game where you watch your DVG logo bounce across the screen and destroy your enemies with various abilities. Who are your enemies? Well none other than other mixed media from across the ages.
